folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are two birds; human-headed winged hybrid; and man/ wearing hat/ holding blank scroll in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 25v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid woman/ wearing veil and wimple; bird; nude man grasping foliate ornament; bird hybrid; and man/ wearing hat/ holding blank scroll in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 26v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ looking over its left shoulder/ with wings extended; man kneeling with joined hands raised; two moths; hybrid animal with bat wings; dog; and bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 27v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man with bat wings and pointy ears; bird with extended wings; monkey wearing cape; and bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 28v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are crane/ with wings raised; nude man seated in fishing net; swan; hybrid man/ wearing hat/ holding staff with heraldic banner in right hand and holding horn to his mouth with left hand; moth; peacock; and stag/ laying down/ looking over shoulder toward red-faced hybrid/ winged/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 29v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are moth; wild man playing horn held to mouth with left hand; and nude man playing lute/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 32r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are moth; stag laying down; man/ wearing hood/ with pouch at waist/ playing horn held to mouth with left hand; and ape (monkey)/ standing/ holding buttocks/ turning to look over shoulder at man/ wearing cap/ aiming bow and arrow toward the ape/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 33v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are monkeys/ including one on all fours; one standing erect with two baby monkeys on its back; and one seated astride dog/ holding rod in both hands like a lance/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 34r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing hat/ with bird's body; man/ wearing pointed hood and playing drum; hybrid man with lion's body; bird; and animal/ possibly dog/ laying down/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 35v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ wearing hat/ standing and playing bagpipe; peacock with tail fanned; and male archer/ aiming bow and arrow at human-headed hybrid wearing hat/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 36r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are kneeling archer/ wearing hat/ aiming bow and arrow; hairy figure/ possibly one-legged wild man (?); and nude man/ wearing hat/ tucking up his legs; holding cloth in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 37r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are peacock; man/ wearing hood/ seated and playing horn; monkey/ seated and holding horn in both hands; and man/ wearing pointy-eared hood/ squatting down and holding human-faced scepter in right hand and raising left hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 39r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch; monkey/ walking upright with staff in both hands/ carrying at least three baby monkeys in basket on its back; peacock with tail fanned out; and dragon flanked by two hybrid men/ one wearing hat/ aiming crossbow at the dragon/ and the other wearing hood/ stabbing dragon in the mouth with spear/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 40r
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Visitation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ and Elizabeth/ nimbed/ wearing veil and wimple/ embrace/ Rays descend toward them from above/ Scene in landscape with mountains and trees/Amid foliate ornament in margins are angel/ kneeling/ holding open book with pseudo-inscription in both hands; goose; angel/ nimbed/ kneeling ahd playing portative organ; angel/ nimbed/ kneeling and playing harp; man/ wearing hat/ seated cross-legged and playing pipe and tabor; angel/ nimbed/ seated cross-legged and holding blank tablet in lap with both hands; and winged hybrid man playing viol/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 41v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ wearing hat/ standing and holding spear in right hand and human-faced shield on left arm; man/ with purse at waist/ standing and aiming crossbow; man/ wearing hat or helmet/ with both hands raised to his breast; winged dragon; and hybrid man/ holding blank scroll or cloth in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 43v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid animal/ turning its head to poke its own hindquarters with its beak; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ playing bagpipe; and hawk with wings extended/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 44v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ possibly cuckoo; monkey on all fours climbing up foliage; archer/ wearing hat/ aiming bow and arrow upward toward right; nude woman/ seated; and wild man/ holding club and shield/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 45r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are partridge; cuckoo; bird with serpent held in its beak and feet; and a hybrid man/ wearing hat/ playing tabor held to his mouth with both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 46r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are three birds/ including two with wings extended and one with its beak to its breast; hybrid man with right arm raised; and hybrid bird with moth wings/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 47r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ possibly with pig's body; bird/ possibly thrush; hybrid animal with beak and pointy ears; bird with wings extended; hybrid man/ wearing headgear/ holding rod in right hand; and lion/ seated/ turning to look back over its shoulder/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 50r
folio_text: Christ: Nativity -- Nude Christ Child/ nimbed/ emanating rays/ lays on straw and is flanked by Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ kneeling with joined hands raised/ and Joseph the Carpenter/ nimbed/ kneeling/ holding roll in right hand and staff in left hand/ In background is bed/ pitcher in footed basin/ and shed with ox and ass/Amid foliate ornament in margins are pig/ wearing mantle; hybrid animal with bat wings; man/ kneeling on one knee and holding scroll with pseudo-inscription; man/ wearing hat/ sitting and holding rod in both hands; angel/ playing viol; and woman/ kneeling/ playing portative organ/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 51v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are monkey/ wearing cape/ crouching; bird/ possibly duck/ with wings extended; two birds forming heart shape/ one possibly thrush; angel/ playing pipe held with both hands; and owl/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 52v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are fantastic animal/ holding pipe to mouth (?) with both hands; owl/ with wings raised; bird with moth wings; and hybrid man/ wearing hat/ aiming bow and arrow toward the hybrid bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 54v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch/ with wings extended; and merman/ wearing helmet/ aiming bow and arrow/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 55r
folio_text: Shepherds: Annunciation -- Angel/ nimbed/ emanating rays/ holding in both hands scroll with pseudo-inscription/ hovers above two shepherds/ one wearing hat/ seated and drinking from canteen/ and the other standing/ with right hand raised to forehead/ both holding staves/ in field with dog and flock/ In background are mountains/ castle/ and trees/Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch; hybrid man/ wearing hat and capelet/ standing on all four paws; two additional birds/ one a goldfinch; and a lion/ laying down/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 56v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ wearing hat/ kneeling and holding blank scroll in his hands; bird/ with wings extended; and monkey/ wearing cowl/ on all fours/ grasping foliage with right paw/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 57r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are dog/ laying down/ with forelegs tucked beneath body; bird/ with head behind raised right wing; and man/ wearing cap/ kneeling on one knee/ behind human-faced shield held on left arm/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 59r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch; hybrid bird with human face and moth (?) wings/ wearing hat; and monkey/ wearing hat and capelet/ curled into a ball/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 60r
folio_text: Magi: Adoration -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ sits on bed and holds in her lap nude Christ Child/ with crossed nimbus/ extending his arms toward gold casket extended by magus/ kneeling on ground beside his crown/ Behind the kneeling magus stand the other two magi/ one wearing crown and ermine collar/ pointing up toward star in sky with right hand and holding vessel in left hand/ and the other magus/ black/ wearing hat/ holding vessel with both hands/ Scene before shed in which are ox and ass/Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing cap/ holding human-faced shield in right hand; goldfinch with wings extended; duck with wings extended; archer/ wearing cap/ kneeling and aiming bow; and half figure of man/ wearing hood/ with right hand raised/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 61r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch/ with right foot raised/ looking over shoulder; thrush/ with wings extended; and man/ wearing hood/ kneeling with left hand on hip/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 62v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are thrush; hybrid man with dog (?) body/ wearing hat and capelet; and hybrid bird with moth wings/Text is Ecclesiasticus 24:15/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 63v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird/ with human head and extended wings; hybrid man with bear (?) body/ wearing pointed hood; and archer/ wearing cap/ kneeling and aiming bow and arrow/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 64v
folio_text: Christ: Presentation -- Anna the Prophetess/ wearing headdress/ holding candle in right hand and basket of doves in left hand/ kneels behind Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ kneeling ahd holding nude Christ Child/ with crossed nimbus/ before draped altar/ Behind the altar stands Simeon/ nimbed wearing papal vestments and cross-surmounted triple tiara/ extending draped hands across altar toward the Christ Child/ Beside altar stands Joseph the Carpenter (?)/ wearing hat/ holding rod in right hand/ Scene in temple with wooden ceiling/ arched windows/ wall hanging/ and tiled floor/Amid foliate ornament in margins are dog/ laying down/ looking over its right shoulder; and man/ standing/ playing horn held to mouth with right hand and holding staff in left hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 65r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing hood/ holding human-faced shield in left hand and club in raised right hand; bird/ possibly dove; and bird/ possibly with moth wings/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 69r
folio_text: Christ: Flight into Egypt -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ holding swaddled Christ Child/ with crossed nimbus/ sits sideways on ass led by Joseph the Carpenter/ nimbed/ with rod held over left shoulder/ turning to look toward Virgin Mary/ Rays descend from above toward Virgin Mary/ In background is distant landscape/Amid foliate ornament in margins are thrush with extended wings; and hybrid man/ wearing hood/ playing rebec/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 70r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch; hybrid animal/ with beak/ seated; and hybrid man/ winged/ wearing hat/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 72r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are monkey/ on all fours with forelegs bent and head down; owl; and peacock with tail fanned/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 74v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing hood/ playing lute; fox/ wearing cowl/ seated; and bird/ turning to look over right shoulder/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 75v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Coronation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ kneels with joined hands raised before God/ nimbed/ wearing cross-surmounted papal tiara and vestments/ seated with right hand raised in blessing and holding cross-surmounted globe in left hand/ Above Virgin Mary hovers angel/ nimbed/ holding crown in both hands/ Scene beneath conical canopy and emanating rays/ possibly in clouds of heaven/Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with bat wings; thrush/ with wings extended/ looking over shoulder; fantastic animal with pointy ears; and nude man/ holding staff in right hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 78r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird; pig/ playing shawm; and hybrid bird with bat wings and human face/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 79r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch/ with wings extended and head tucked behind left wing; and hybrid man/ wearing helmet/ with shield on right arm and halberd in left hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 83r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are owl; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with body composed of spiral shell; and goldfinch/ with wings extended and head tucked behind left wing/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 84r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing hat/ playing shawm held to mouth with both hands; hybrid man/ wearing hat/ with bird-like body and moth wings; and goldfinch/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 85r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ with dog-like body/ wearing hood; man/ wearing hat/ kneeling/ touching his face with his hands; and goldfinch/ with right wing extended/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 86v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird with bat wings; hybrid man/ with animal body/ wearing hood; and goldfinch/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 88v
folio_text: Pentecost -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ with left hand on breast/ kneels at prie-dieu with her right hand on open book with pseudo-inscription/ Around her kneel eleven nimbed apostles/ two with joined hands raised/ one with both hands on breast/ and one with right hand on breast and left hand extended to side/ Above hovers dove of Holy Ghost/ with rays as nimbus/ emitting rays of fire toward them/ Scene in room with arched windows/ wooden barrel vault/ and tiled floor/Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ with wings extended and left foot raised; bird with moth wings; goldfinch/ with wings extended; and hybrid man/ with pointed ears/ wearing capelet/ seated and playing shawm/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 91v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid animal with human face and bat wings; man/ tonsured/ seated with his back turned/ possibly holding round object; and hybrid bird/ with human face/ wearing wimple (?)/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 92v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are thrush/ perched on foliage; man/ wearing hat/ seated and playing shawm; and deer/ laying down and looking over right shoulder/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 94r
folio_text: David: in Prayer -- David kneels with hands raised and looks up toward Christ-Logos/ cross-nimbed/ bearded/ holding globe in left hand and pointing toward the globe with right hand/ all in orb of heaven/ emanating rays/ On ground beside David are open book with pseudo-inscription/ pointed hat-like crown with ermine trim/ and harp; behind David is draped altar within temple with leaded-glass windows/ In background is distant landscape/Amid foliate ornament in margins are dog/ laying down with body curled and head down; and male figure/ possibly wild man/ wearing hat/ seated and playing pipe/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 95v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are dove/ with right leg lifted/ looking over left shoulder; hybrid man/ winged/ with dog (?) body/ seated on all fours; and hybrid man/ wearing cowl/ with pointed ears and two legs/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 96v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ kneeling and holding shield; hybrid bird/ with bat wings; and man/ with right hand and left leg on pole/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 97v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch/ standing with wings extended and beak open; bird/ perched/ looking over left shoulder; and hybrid man/ winged/ wearing hood/ seated/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 98v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird hybrid with beak and animal body; and man/ hooded/ kneeling and holding blank scroll in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 100r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goldfinch; man/ wearing hood/ holding staff in right hand/ standing and looking upward; and hybrid man in snail shell/ wearing hat/ playing bladder pipe held to his mouth with both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 102v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are monkey/ wearing short mantle/ bending forward and waving arms; goldfinch/ with right leg raised and wings extended; two hybrid birds/ one with animal head/ possibly ass/ and the other with human head; and man/ hooded/ holding object/ possibly scissors/ in right hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 103r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird with swan-like neck; bird/ turning to look over left shoulder; goose; and hybrid man/ wearing hood with pointy ears/ standing on four legs and aiming bow and arrow toward hybrid animal with wings/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 105r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ wearing pointed hat/ with right human hand touching foliage; angel/ seated or kneeling/ playing lute; hybrid bird with moth wings; and winged monkey/ squatting down and with left hand on his buttocks/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 106v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are dog/ laying down; hybrid bird with moth wings; man/ wearing hood/ squatting down and holding foliage with his hands; and goldfinch/ with wings extended and right foot raised/ possibly pecking at ground/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 107v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are angel/ sitting cross-legged and playing shawm held to mouth with both hands; goldfinch/ with wings extended; dove/ lifting right foot; hybrid man/ wearing hood with pointy ears/ standing on all fours; and hybrid woman/ wearing henin/ holding staff in both hands/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 109v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid animal with spiral tail and two legs; hybrid animal with moth wings; hybrid man/ wearing hood with pointy ears/ standing on two animal legs; hybrid man/ standing on two of four legs and holding shepherd's crook (staff) in right hand; and hybrid animal with bat wings and beak/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 111r
folio_text: Scene/ Liturgical: Burial -- Tonsured priest/ wearing vestments/ holding aspergil in right hand/ and acolyte/ holding processional cross in right hand and situla in left hand/ stand and flank body wrapped in cross-inscribed shroud/ being lowered by kneeling man into grave dug in tile floor of church/ Beside the man are two shovels (spades)/ and behind the priest stand two hooded mourners/ Scene in church interior with groin vaulted ceiling/ draped altar with carved retable/ with Crucifixion scene/ and leaded-glass windows/Amid foliate ornament in margins are owl/ with wings extended; hybrid man/ wearing hat/ aiming bow and arrow; bear/ seated/ with right foreleg extended; goldfinch/ with left leg raised and wings extended; hybrid man/ winged/ wearing hat/ playing bagpipe; and winged dragon/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 114v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are wivern; peacock/ with tail fanned out; hybrid man/ wearing hat surmounted with goose head/ standing on two legs and holding horn to his mouth with left hand; hybrid man/ winged/ wearing hat/ standing on all fours; hybrid man/ winged/ wearing pointed hat; and bear/ possibly licking its right front paw/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 115r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are goose/ sitting; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ aiming bow and arrow toward a second goose/ standing with wings extended; hybrid man/ wearing hood with pointed ears/ seated; dove; animal/ possibly dog; and goldfinch/ with wings extended and looking over right shoulder/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 116v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are owl; goldfinch/ with wings extended/ looking over left shoulder; and hybrid man/ standing on four legs/ playing lute held in both arms/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 119r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ with moth body and wings and bird feet/ wearing hat; man/ wearing hood/ kneeling and holding human-faced shield; man/ wearing hat/ kneeling and playing shawm; hybrid bird with jackal-like head; and man/ kneeling/ holding staff in right hand and human-faced shield on left arm/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 120v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are angel/ squatting down/ holding rod in both hands; fantastic animal with moth wings and beak; fantastic animal with short legs/ scales on breast/ moth wings/ and human-looking face; bird with long beak; and animal/ possibly monkey/ wearing cowl/ possibly sitting on object/ possibly hay bale/ stump/ or beehive/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 121v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ with oversize head/ wearing hood/ seated and extending arms; bird/ with wings extended/ looking over right shoulder; hybrid man/ wearing helmet/ possibly soldier/ shown from rear; and animal laying down/ possibly ass/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 122r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ wearing hood/ kneeling with joined hands raised; soldier/ wearing helmet/ holding spear in right hand and human-faced shield in left hand; and bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 124r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are nude man/ wearing hood/ kneeling and holding human-faced shield; thrush with wings extended and left foot raised; fantastic animal with moth wings; and half figure of animal/ possibly bear/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 125r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are angel/ wearing hood with pointed ears/ seated; man/ possibly wearing cap/ bending forward with joined hands; man/ wearing hat/ possibly kneeling/ holding blank scroll in both hands; and bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 126v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are dragon; wild man/ wearing hood/ crouching and raising left hand; bishop/ wearing miter and cope/ holding staff in both hands; and bat (?)/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 128r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are fantastic animal/ laying down with legs folded beneath it; man/ holding rod in right hand/ seated cross-legged; bird with head plume and long beak; man/ playing pipe and tabor; and dog/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 129v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are angel/ possibly nimbed/ kneeling and holding rod; bird/ with wings extended; hybrid man/ wearing hood with pointed ears/ with animal body and bat wings; man/ wearing hat/ climbing onto horizontal surface; and man/ wearing hood/ with left hand raised to face and looking upward/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 130r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are peacock/ with tail fanned; angel/ wearing hat/ kneeling with his hands held to his face; bird/ with wings extended/ holding object in its beak; and blue horse/ laying down/ with nose to its right shoulder/Text is Job 13:22-28/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 131v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ with wings extended and head tucked behind right wing; hybrid bird with moth wings; bird with wings extended and beak turned to left wing; hybrid man/ with pig hindquarters and bat wings; and fantastic animal/ wearing capelet/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 132r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird/ possibly with moth body and wings; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with wolf hindquarters and bat wings/ holding rod with both hands; bird/ with right foot raised; fantastic animal; and goose/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 133v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ with extended wings; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with monkey body/ grasping rod or branch with both hands; and bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 134v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird/ with moth wings; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with wolf hindquarters/ holding spear in right hand and shield in left hand; hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with bird body and wings/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 136v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are cat; peacock; and hybrid man/ wearing helmet/ with sash at waist/ holding human-faced shield in left hand and spear in raised right hand/Text is Job 19:20-27/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 137v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are man/ kneeling/ rolling bedroll (?); animal/ possibly dog/ laying down and looking over left shoulder; and goldfinch/Text in Job 13:14-16/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 138v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird with human face and pointed ears; goldfinch/ with head turned over right shoulder; and musician/ playing shawm and extending left leg/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 140v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ with right foot raised; hybrid bird/ with human face/ wearing hat; and woman/ as half figure emerging from flower/ wearing henin/ holding rod in right hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 141r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid bird/ with beak/ four legs/ and moth wings; bird with wings extended; and hybrid man/ possibly with lion body/ wearing hood/ with human-faced shield in left hand and holding sword to his cheek with right hand/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 143r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ winged/ wearing hat; hybrid animal/ with bird head and dog (?) body; bear/ seated/ with right paw held to its mouth; man/ wearing hood/ crouching/ and holding human-faced shield in right hand and sword in left hand; and hybrid animal/ wearing hood with pointed ears/ with sheep (?) head and dog (?) body/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 145r
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ with pointed ears/ bird body and serpent tail; hybrid man with dog (?) hindquarters/ wearing purse at waist and aiming bow and arrow; bird/ with wings extended and right foot raised; hybrid man/ with snail shell and pointed ears/ holding spear in right hand and shield in left hand; and hybrid man/ wearing hood/ with bat wings/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 147v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are bird/ with wings extended and right foot raised; hybrid man/ wearing hat/ holding spear in raised right hand and human-faced shield in left hand; and bird/ with wings extended/ raising left foot/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ ca/ 1470MS M/28 fol/ 148v
folio_text: Amid foliate ornament in margins are hybrid man/ squatting; red-headed bird/ possibly woodpecker; peacock/ with tail fanned; hybrid woman (?)/ wearing hood and pointed hat/ squatting and cradling swaddled infant; hybrid bird with moth wings; and wivern/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 9r
folio_text: David: in Prayer -- David/ crowned/ kneels with joined hands raised beside harp/ Rays descend from arc of heaven at upper left corner/ In background is landscape with river/ mountains and trees; at left is man hanged from gallows (?) and at right is walled city/Margins with foliate ornament/ In left margin is nude man/ wearing hat/ seated astride snail/ In lower margin are two nude men facing each other/ In right margin is partially draped nude man holding sword in right hand and crowned (?) man/ seated astride saddled and bridled bird/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 28v
folio_text: David: anointed -- Samuel/ wearing hat/ pours vessel over head of David/ seated on bench with joined hands raised/ To right stands Jesse/ wearing hat/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 41v
folio_text: David/ crowned/ holding scepter in left hand/ sits on bench before curtain and points with right hand toward devil/ winged/ standing with left hand on club held like walking staff/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 52v
folio_text: Figure/ Male: Fool -- Man (fool)/ partially draped in garment/ holds club (stick) in right hand and with left hand points to his mouth/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 65r
folio_text: David/ crowned/ orant/ stands in muddy river/ Rays descend from top left/ In background are towers on hilltops and trees/Margins with foliate ornament and two birds/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 76r
folio_text: David: as Musician -- David/ crowned/ sits on bench and with mallets in each hand strikes bells of cymbala hanging above his head/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 89r
folio_text: Scene/ Liturgical: Chanting (?) -- Four tonsured monks/ wearing vestments/ stand before lectern upon which is open book with pseudo-inscription/ Scene in interior/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 102r
folio_text: Trinity: God/ Man of Sorrows and Dove -- Christ/ cross-nimbed/ partially draped in mantle/ bleeding from wounds as Man of Sorrows/ holding globe and cross staff in left hand/ sits on bench beside God/ cross nimbed/ with right hand raised in blessing and holding globe in left hand on left knee/ Between Christ and God is dove (tarnished silver leaf ?) of Holy Spirit/Margins with foliate ornament/ In lower margin is partially draped nude man/ possibly wearing cap or helmet/ holding scimitar in raised right hand/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 177r
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Annunciation -- Archangel Gabriel/ nimbed/ kneels on one knee holding scroll (tarnished silver ?)in left hand and pointing with right hand toward Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ with arms crossed on breast/ kneeling at prie-dieu with open book with pseudo-inscription/ Dove of Holy Ghost descends on rays through window/ Behind Virgin Mary is cloth of honor/ and in front of prie-dieu is vase with silver lily (tarnished)/ Scene in church interior with lancet windows with tracery and groin-vaulted ceilings/Margins with foliate ornament/ In right margin is peacock with tail fanned and nude woman climbing foliage/ In lower margin is unidentified escutcheon of arms (argent a rosette sable between S and P)/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 187r
folio_text: Scene/ Liturgical: Obsequies -- Tonsured priest/ wearing vestments/ holding open book with pseudo-inscription in left hand and aspergil in right hand/ stands before open coffin in which lies skeleton/ Behind the priest stands tonsured acolyte/ holding situla in right hand/ To right stand acolyte holding processional cross with both hands and group of hooded mourners/ Scene inside walled landscape with church and trees outside wall/Margins with foliate ornament/ In right margin is snail and in lower margin is bird/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 193v
folio_text: Christ: Crucifixion -- Christ/ nimbed/ wearing short loin cloth and crown of thorns/ bleeding from wounds/ is affixed with three nails to cross with titulus inscribed INRI/ Flanking the cross are Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ with hands crossed on her breast/ and Evangelist John/ nimbed/ with hands clasped/ In background are distant mountains/Within initial D is unidentified escutcheon of arms (argent a rosette sable between S and P)/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Psalter-HoursFrance/ Provence/ ca/ 1460MS M/29 fol/ 201v
folio_text: Pentecost -- Virgin Mary and apostles/ all nimbed/ kneel/ some with joined hands raised below dove of Holy Ghost/ with wings outstretched/ descending on rays from above/Margins with foliate ornament/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 13v
folio_text: Christ:Crucifixion -- Christ/ crossed nimbus/ with crown of thorns/ wearing short loincloth/ bleeding from wounds/ is affixed with three nails to tau cross with titulus/ INRI/ At left are Holy Women/ nimbed (only nimbus visible of one)/ Evangelist John/ nimbed/ his right hand on right shoulder of Virgin Mary/ nimbed and veiled/ with joined hands/ kneeling or swooning/ At right are Longinus of Jerusalem with scroll inscribed VERE FILIUS DEI ERAT ISTE/ and soldier and man wearing knotted sash as headgear/ indicating Christ with right hand/ Above/ rays descend toward cross from arc of Heaven/Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by peacock/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 22v
folio_text: Pentecost -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ seated/ holding open book on her lap with both hands/ is flanked by ten (?) Apostles/ nimbed (some only nimbi visible)/ some with joined hands/ one with hands crossed on breast/ Dove of Holy Ghost hovers above Virgin Mary/ amid rays/Scene in vaulted room with windows/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/ possibly pheasant/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 30v
folio_text: Angel/ kneeling/ extends object toward nude Christ Child/ crossed nimbus/ standing on lap of Virgin Mary/ nimbed and crowned/ seated on faldstool with canopy/Scene in room with wood ceiling/ two windows/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 44v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Annunciation -- Archangel Gabriel/ holding scroll inscribed AVE GRATIA PLENA DOMINUS [gu]/ kneels behind Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ kneeling at prie-dieu beneath canopy/ and turning back to look toward Gabriel/ Between them is vase containing lily/ Visible through doorway/ is head of God/ crossed nimbus/ in arc of Heaven/ emanting rays on which dove of Holy Ghost flies toward Virgin Mary/Scene in room with wood ceiling/ pendant/ two windows/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by hybrid man/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 66v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Visitation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ and Elizabeth/ nimbed and veiled with wimple/ stand in partial embrace before entrance to building/Scene in landscape with ship in stream/ and buildings in background/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 80v
folio_text: Christ: Nativity -- Nude Christ Child/ crossed nimbus/ reclines amid rays on cushion/ flanked by Joseph the Carpenter and Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ both kneeling with joined hands raised/ Angel/ with joined hands/ kneels at His head/ Dove of Holy Ghost descends towards Him on rays emanating from arc of Heaven/Scene partially covered by roof of shed (?)/ with landscape in background/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 86v
folio_text: Shepherds: Annunciation -- Two shepherds stand amid sheep/ each holding pedum with one hand and shielding eyes with the other arm/ Third shepherd sits over crest of hill with joined hands raised/ Above/ bust of angel holds scroll with partially legible inscription of GLORIA IN EX[CELSIS]/Scene in landscape with trees and buildings/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 92v
folio_text: Magi: Adoration -- Eldest Magus kneels holding open casket before nude Christ Child/ crossed nimbus/ extending His arms/ standing on lap of Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ Hat with crown of the Magus is in foreground/ Other two Magi/ wearing headgear with crowns stand behind first Magus/ holding covered vessels/ one indicating toward right with left hand/Scene under shed (?) roof/ with landscape in distance/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 98v
folio_text: Christ: Presentation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ holds nude Christ child/ crossed nimbus/ before draped altar/ His arms are extended toward draped hands of Simeon of Jerusalem/ wearing bishop's miter/ standing next to altar/ Woman wearing headdress stands behind Virgin Mary; two men/ wearing hats/ flank Simeon/Scene in room with wood ceiling and windows/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 104v
folio_text: Innocents: Massacre -- Soldier/ holding dagger or sword in left hand/ extends right arm toward woman/ wearing headgear/ holding swaddled infant/ nimbed/ bleeding (?) from wound in head/ The woman kneels before Herod/ wearing hat with crown/ right hand raised/ holding scepter with left hand/ seated on throne with canopy/Scene in room with wood ceiling and window/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 114v
folio_text: Christ: Flight into Egypt -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed and veiled/ holding swaddled Christ Child/ crossed nimbus/ rides sideways on ass/ Joseph the Carpenter/ wearing hat/ carrying draped staff over left shoulder walks at head of the ass/Scene in landscape with buildings in background/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 119v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Coronation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ with joined hands/ kneels before Christ/ crossed nimbus/ right hand extended in blessing/ holding tripartite globe with left hand/ seated on throne with canopy/ Angel/ holding crown/ hovers above Mary; another angel/ with joined hands/ kneels behind her/Scene in room with wood ceiling and window/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 123v
folio_text: David: communicating with God -- David/ eyes closed/ orant/ kneels next to harp and hat with crown/ Above/ head of God/ crossed nimbus appears in arc of Heaven emanating rays/Scene in landscape with buildings/ water with ships/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by owl/

tomb_text: Book of HoursBelgium/ Bruges/ ca/ 1470MS M/30 fol/ 148v
folio_text: Christ: Miracle of raising Lazarus -- Woman/ and two other nimbed figures (only nimbi visible) stand behind Christ/ crossed nimbus raising right hand in blessing/ holding tripartite globe in left hand/ He stands next to grave from which emerges Lazarus/ with joined hands/ partially draped in shroud/ At end of grave/ behind Lazarus/ stand four men/ wearing hats/ one holding cloth to face/Scene in room with wood ceiling and window/ Miniature in grisaille with gold and color detail/Margins decorated with border of floreate ornament/ in grisaille with color detail/ inhabited by bird/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 13r
folio_text: Christ: Betrayal and Arrest and Apostle/ Peter: cutting off Ear of Malchus -- Christ/ rays as crossed nimbus/ is kissed by Judas/ holding sack in left hand/ Behind them stand five soldiers/ holding spears/ halberds and trident/ Christ extends His right hand toward Malchus/ seated in foreground/ supported by left hand/ next to which is lantern/ With his right hand/ he grasps mantle of Peter/ nimbed/ raising saber (?) with right hand/ extending left toward right ear of Malchus/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 61r
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Annunciation -- Archangel Gabriel/ nimbed/ with cross surmounting head/ holds scepter with left hand and extends right hand toward Virgin Mary/ kneeling at prie-dieu on which is open book/ her right hand on breast/ left hand on the book/ Between them is vase containing lilies/ Above left/ half figure of God/ wearing papal tiara/ appears in arc of Heaven/ Dove of Holy Ghost/ in rayed mandorla/ flies between God and Virgin Mary/ In background is draped canopied bed/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 68v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Visitation -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ extends left hand toward Elizabeth/ nimbed and wearing headdress and wimple/ kneeling on one knee/ extending right hand to left shoulder of Mary/Scene in landscape with trees and with building on hilltop/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 77r
folio_text: Christ: Nativity -- Nude Christ Child/ rays as cross nimbus/ reclines amid rays in manger/ Virgin Mary/ rays as nimbus/ with joined hands raised/ kneels at His feet/ Joseph the Carpenter/ nimbed/ sits at His head/ holding candle (?) with left hand/ In background/ ox and ass are behind wattle fence/ Scene is within ruined walls of shed with thatched roof/ In distance/ two shepherds stand on hill below angel amid rays (Shepherds: Annunciation)/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 81r
folio_text: Shepherds: Annunciation -- Two of three shepherds/ seated/ turning/ raise left hands and look up toward angel hovering amid rays/ holding scroll inscribed GLORIA IN EXSEVLSIS/ The third shepherd sleeps/ leaning on rock next to dog wearing collar/Scene in landscape with dead tree/ and with sheep in background/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 84v
folio_text: Magi: Adoration -- Virgin Mary/ rays as nimbus/ is seated/ holding nude Christ Child on her lap/ He reaches toward open vessel held by eldest Magus/ kneeling on one knee/ Of the other two Magi standing behind him/ one wears hat/ and holds covered vessel in left hand/ and the third/ black/ is removing (?) hat with right hand and extending covered vessel with left hand/Scene in landscape with classical pediment on which Virgin Mary is seated/ and with ruined building in background/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 88v
folio_text: Christ: Presentation -- Behind circular altar on pedestal decorated with acanthus leaves/ Simeon of Jerusalem/ nimbed/ wearing bishop's miter and cope/ standing below canopy/ holds/ on drape/ nude Christ Child/ He extends left arm and looks toward Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ kneeling with joined hands resting on altar/ Joseph the Carpenter/ nimbed/ stands next to her holding small box containing doves (?)/ Acolyte/ tonsured/ stands holding book open toward Simeon/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 92v
folio_text: Christ: Flight into Egypt -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ sits sideways on bridled ass/ holding nude Christ Child/ rays as cross nimbus/ reaching away/ Joseph/ nimbed/ holding reins with right hand and staff over left shoulder with left hand/ walks at head of ass/Scene in landscape with trees/ and rocky road/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 98r
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Coronation -- Virgin Mary/ with joined hands raised/ kneeling/ is flanked by Christ and angel/ Christ/ rays as cross nimbus/ with bleeding wound in side/ seated/ raises right hand in blessing and holds crown with left hand above head of Mary/ Angel holds the crown with both hands/ All before mandorla of rays in which dove of Holy Ghost hovers in another mandorla of rays/ Amid clouds surrounding first mandorla are winged heads or angels/ some possibly nimbed/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 113r
folio_text: Christ: Crucifixion -- Christ/ rays as nimbus/ wearing crown of thorns and short loincloth/ bleeding from wounds/ is affixed with three nails to cross/ He is flanked by Virgin Mary/ nimbed and veiled with wimple/ eyes cast down/ head turned away/ with clasped hands/ and by Evangelist John/ nimbed/ hands clasped and raised/ looking up toward Christ/ Mary Magdalen (?)/ nimbed/ crouches at foot of the cross with right arm wrapped around the cross/Scene in landscape with rocky outcrop/ and with city in distance/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 116r
folio_text: Pentecost -- Virgin Mary/ nimbed and veiled with wimple/ with joined hands/ is seated flanked by 15 (?) apostles/ nimbed/ (except for Evangelist John) kneeling/ some with joined hands raised/ Peter raises right hand to shield eyes from Dove of Holy Ghost/ nimbed/ hovering above in rayed mandorla/ emanating rays/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 119r
folio_text: David/ nimbed/ left hand raised/ right hand extended/ kneels on one knee looking up toward angel extending skull in right hand and holding arrows or withes with left hand/ Harp/ partially in sack/ and turban style headgear with crown (?) are on ground before David/Scene in landscape with rocks/ trees/ and buildings in distance/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 136r
folio_text: Job: with Wife and Job: with Friends Three -- Job/ wearing loincloth/ is seated on dungheap extending right hand/ His wife/ wearing headdress/ right hand on breast/ standing at right hand of Job/ indicates him with her left hand/ Two men/ wearing hats/ the first leaning on staff with crossed arms/ stand next to Job/Scene next to building with shed roof/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 187v
folio_text: Male donor/ with joined hands raised/ his hat on floor beside him/ has scroll next to his mouth inscribed O MATER DEI PIISSIMA PRO ME FILIVM SEMPER ORA/ He kneels before nude Christ Child/ rays as cross nimbus/ wearing necklace/ holding green bird in right hand and indicating the donor with left hand/ half standing on lap of Virgin Mary/ nimbed and crowned/ seated on throne with canopy/Scene in room decorated with architectural ornament/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ perhaps Tours/ 1500-1525MS M/31 fol/ 189r
folio_text: Christ: Crucifixion/ Symbolic -- Christ/ rays as cross nimbus/ wearing crown of thorns and loincloth/ bleeding from wounds/ embraces cross with titulus INRI/ on ground next to purple robe/ From His mouth issues scroll inscribed O PATER CLEMENTISSIME PECATORIBUS MISERERE QVORVM INIQVITATES VOLVISTI ME PORTARE/ At left/ personification of Justice/ wearing helmet and armor/ holding flaming sword with right hand/ supports her head with left hand resting on left knee/ her tunic inscribed DICIAE VINE IVSTI VINDICTA/ From the mouth of personification of Charity issues scroll inscribed O INFINITA CHARITAS MEE IN ETERNVM CVSTODIE HVNC PECCATREM COMMITTE/ Her mantle is inscribed MISERICORDIA SVPER EXALTAT IVDICIVM/ She holds branch with left hand and with right hand touches head of sinner/ whose tunic is inscribed PEREGRINVS PECCATOR/ The sinner/ with joined hands raised/ kneels/ next to staff and pilgrim's hat/ looking toward Christ/ From his mouth issues scroll inscribed O IESV PIISSIME TVE PASSIONIS SALVTIFERE ME PARTICIPE ME EFFICE/At right stand three men/ one wearing armor/ two wearing hats/ each holding instrument of passion including rope/ hammer and nails/ One also holds shield/ Above/ half figure of God/ wearing papal tiara with infulae/ raising right hand in blessing/ and holding cross surmounted globe with left hand/ appears in arc of Heaven emanating rays/ amid which dove of Holy Ghost flies toward Christ/Scene in landscape with trees and with hills in distance/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 4r
folio_text: Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: January -- Three men/ wearing hats/ including one holding object or vessel/ surround draped trestle-table/ all in front of fireplace in room with four arched windows and tiled floor (feasting)//	Margins decorated with border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies/ roses/ currants and grapes/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 4v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Pride/ inscribed ORGUEL/ is represented by crowned king/ seated on throne/ holding floreate scepter in left hand and mirror in right hand/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil/ with claw-foot visible/ extending hands to the mirror//	Figures in room with four arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration/ including roses//	Margin/ lower:/	Christ: Baptism -- Beneath rays descending from arc of heaven/ and stars/ Christ/ name inscribed IHESUS/ cross-nimbed/ nude/ with joined hands raised/ stands partly submerged in water/ flanked by angel holding garment/ and John Baptist/ nimbed/ wearing animal skin (?)/ kneeling/ with vessel in right hand baptizing head of Christ (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Aquarius)//	Scene in landscape with hills and water beyond//	Square vignette within block border of floreate decoration/ including thistles//	Block border at left margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including grapes and currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 5r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Humility/ inscribed HUMILITE/ is represented by veiled woman/ with right hand extended and with left hand at breast/ standing in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: February -- Man/ wearing hat/ seated on chair beside footstool/ extends hands toward fire in hooded fireplace with pothook and andirons/ At left/ female attendant/ wearing headdress and apron/ hand/ and at right male attendant/ wearing hat/ holding shovel (?) in left hand/ both extend their hands toward the fire (warming)//	Scene in room with light streaming through arched window and tiled fireplace hearth and floor//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate decoration/ including thistles//	Block border at right margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 5v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Envy/ inscribed ENVIE/ is represented by man/ wearing headgear/ with right hand at chest and with left hand holding sack with tassels/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil with claw feet//	Figures stand in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration//	Margin/ lower:/	Jonah: cast up -- Beneath starry sky and rays descending from arc of heaven/ Jonah/ name inscribed I(O)NIAS/ crowned/ nude/ with joined hands raised/ emerges from mouth of whale (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Pisces)//	Scene in water between hilly shores with trees//	Square vignette within block border of floreate decoration//	Block border at left margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 6r
Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 6v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Anger/ inscribed IRE/ is represented by man/ wearing hat/ with sword in right hand piercing himself in breast/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil with claw feet//	Figures stand in room with four arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration/ including daisies//	Margin/ lower:/	Abraham: sacrificing Isaac -- Beneath stars/ angel/ with left hand raised/ stays sword of Abraham/ name inscribed ABRAHAM/ looking back and extending left hand to shoulder of Isaac/ blindfolded/ with joined hands raised/ kneeling on slab of rock/ In left foreground/ ram appears in profile (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Aries)//	Scene in hilly landscape with trees and water beyond//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including grapes//	Block border at left margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including thistles and currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 7r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Patience/ inscribed PACIE(N)CE/ is represented by woman/ wearing wimpled veil/ with joined hands raised/ in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: April -- Woman/ wearing headdress/ gathers flowers in fold of garment/ beside youth and man/ both wearing hats and carrying flowering branches on right shoulders/ all in garden with trellis; trees in background//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 7v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Sloth/ inscribed PERESCE/ is represented by man/ wearing headgear/ tunic/ unravelled stockings and shoe/ beside another shoe on floor/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil with claw feet/ extending hands//	Figures stand in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate decoration//	Margin/ lower:/	Jacob: wrestling with Angel -- Under starry sky/ angel and Jacob/ inscribed IACOB/ grasp each other/ in hilly landscape with trees (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Taurus)//	Square vignette within block border of floreate decoration/ including thistles//	Block border at right margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 8r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Diligence/ inscribed DILIGENCE/ is represented by woman/ wearing headdress/ holding broom in right hand/ standing in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including strawberries//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: May -- Beneath starry sky/ mounted horseman/ wearing hat/ holding falcon in left hand/ turns head back toward horsewoman/ wearing veiled hennin/ seated sideways on bridled horse/ followed by male attendant/ wearing hat/ holding leafy branch in left hand (courting)//	Figures on path in hilly landscape with trees//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right margin with floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 8v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Avarice/ inscribed AVARICE/ is represented by man/ wearing hat/ holding scales in right hand/ seated at table/ on which are coins/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil hovering at right//	Figures in room with two arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including strawberries//	Margin/ lower:/	Eve: Creation -- Beneath starry sky and rays descending from arc of heaven/ Christ-Logos/ cross-nimbed/ wearing purple mantle/ raises right hand in blessing and with left hand grasps left arm of Eve/ drawing her from side of Adam/ name inscribed ADAM/ reclining asleep under tree (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Gemini)//	Figures in hilly landscape with trees//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration//	Block border at left margin with floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 9r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Charity/ inscribed CARITESCE/ is represented by woman/ wearing headdress/ with both hands holding box of coins spilling forth/ standing in room with two arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including thistles//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: June -- Beneath starry sky and rays descending from arc of heaven/ woman/ wearing wimpled veil/ rakes grain/ and man/ wearing hat/ with scythe cuts grain in field/ beside two haystacks; landscape beyond//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 9v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Gluttony/ inscribed GLOUTONITE/ is represented by man/ wearing hat and jug suspended at waist/ with left hand raising food toward his mouth/ accompanied by winged/ horned devil with claw feet//	Figures stand in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including thistles//	Margin/ lower:/	Job: with Friends Three -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ Job/ nude/ covered with sores/ reclines on heap of ashes/ raising left hand toward basket filled with round objects/ possibly coins (?)/ extended in right hand of one of Friends Three; behind them/ stand two friends/ wearing hats and playing flutes (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Cancer)//	Scene in hilly landscape with trees and city in background//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies//	Block border at left of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 10r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Goodness/ inscribed ABONIECE/ is represented by veiled woman holding rosary/ in joined hands raised/ standing in room with three arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: July -- Beneath rays descending from arc of heaven and starry sky/ woman/ wearing headdress and apron/ extends sickle in left hand/ and man/ wearing broad hat/ with scythe in right hand reaps grain/ beside another man/ wearing hat/ kneeling/ gathering one of two bundles of grain/ in field before tall grain//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including violas/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 10v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Vice/ Lust/ inscribed LUXURE/ is represented by man/ wearing hat/ extending right hand to extended right hand of woman/ wearing black headdress and dress with black trim/ accompanied by horned devil with claw feet//	Figures stand in room with two arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses//	Margin/ lower:/	Daniel: in Lions’ Den -- Beneath rays descending from arc of heaven and starry sky/ Daniel/ name inscribed DANIEL/ bearded/ wearing hat/ orant/ is surrounded by three lions/ two licking him at shoulders/ one with extended tongue/ all within broken wall (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Leo)//	Scene in hilly landscape with trees and city in background//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including violas/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 11r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Personification of Virtue/ Chastity/ inscribed CHASTETE/ is represented by woman/ crowned with wreath of flowers/ raising right hand to breast and gathering fold of mantle in left hand/ standing in room with four arched windows/ decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: August -- Before sheaves of grain/ man/ wearing hat/ holds basket/ catching grain/ beside two men/ wearing hats/ raising flails; building with window (threshing)//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration/ including grapes/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 11v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Temptation/ 2nd -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ horned devil kneels behind Christ/ cross-nimbed/ with raised right hand in blessing toward decorated building/ In background are three angels/ one with joined hands raised//	Figures in landscape with hill beyond//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration//	Margin/ lower:/	Virgin Mary: Assumption -- Beneath rays/ Virgin Mary/ name inscribed MARIE/ nimbed/ veiled with wimple/ with joined hands raised/ is borne aloft by six angels/ above hilly landscape with trees (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Virgo)//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including thistles//	Block border at left of floreate and foliate decoration/ including grapes/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 12r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Purging of Temple -- Three men/ wearing pointed hats/ stand behind draped table/ on which one holds open purse with coins spilling forth; at right/ Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ raises scourge in right hand/ attended by Apostle Peter/ nimbed/ tonsured/ with hands raised/ and nimbed apostle//	Figures in room with decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: September -- Beneath rays/ man/ wearing hat/ treads on grapes in wooden vat/ flanked at left by woman/ wearing headdress/ and at right by man/ wearing hat/ both with baskets on their backs/ all in front of brick wall with landscape and trees beyond//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses and daisies/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 12v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Miracle of healing Paralytic -- In front of bed of decorated canopy type/ paralytic carries mattress on head and departs from Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ raising left hand toward him//	Scene in bedroom with tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies//	Margin/ lower:/	Judas: returning Silver -- Judas/ name inscribed IUDAS/ bearded/ wearing moneybag around neck/ extends left hand to extended right fist of High Priest/ tonsured/ wearing mantle with ermine-collar/ in front of four High Priests/ wearing hats/ one raising right forefinger (suggesting link with Zodiac Sign: Libra)//	Scene in building with decorative wall/ tiled floor/ two arched windows/ and doorway/ showing landscape with starry sky and path between trees beyond//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies//	Block border at left of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses and daisies/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 13r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Scene -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ woman/ wearing headdress/ stands with joined hands raised before Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ turning head toward her/ and group of apostles/ two nimbed//	Figures in landscape with hill and trees beyond//	Arched vignette with block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including strawberries//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: October -- Beneath rays descending from arc of heaven and starry sky/ veiled woman bears sack of grain on head with left hand/ beside man/ wearing hat/ with left hand in fold of garment and with right hand sowing seed in furrowed field//	Landscape with trees beyond//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 13v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: meeting Samaritan Woman -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ two nimbed apostles attend Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ with right forefinger indicating Samaritan woman/ veiled/ pulling rope about windlass above hexagonal well; vessel on ground//	Scene in landscape with trees beyond//	Arched vignette with block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including strawberries//	Margin/ lower:/	Moses: crossing Red Sea -- On bank/ horned Moses/ white-haired and bearded/ stands with rod in left hand/ addressing group of Israelites; Pharaoh/ name inscribed REX PHARAON/ wearing headgear/ with hands raised/ mounted on horse/ is partly submerged in sea/ in which Egyptian soldiers are drowning; on distant shore is group of soldiers//	Scene in landscape/ with hills and trees on shores//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at left of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 14r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: delivering Adulteress -- Among group of five scribes and Pharisees/ wearing hats/ the foremost two present adulteress before Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ with lowered left hand indicating ground/ attended by Apostle Peter/ nimbed/ tonsured/ and six apostles/ some nimbed//	Scene in room with decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: November -- Woman/ wearing headdress/ holds staff (?) in left hand/ beside man/ wearing hat/ raising club toward trees/ both surrounded by boars eating acorns scattered on ground//	Scene in landscape with a cluster of trees//	Medallion vignette with block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 14v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Miracle of raising Lazarus -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ two nimbed apostles and Mary of Bethany (?)/ nimbed/ accompany Apostle Peter/ nimbed/ tonsured/ supporting Lazarus/ wearing short loin cloth/ with joined hands/ emerging from grave/ before Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ with right hand raised in blessing/ standing in front of the grave and three men/ wearing hats/ one covering nose//	Scene in landscape with hill and trees beyond//	Arched vignette withing block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including roses//	Margin/ lower:/	Absalom: Death (?) -- Bearded centaur draws arrow in bow toward back of Absalom (?)/ name erroneously inscribed SAUL REX/ crowned/ with his hair caught in tree/ and mounted on bridled white horse (only rear visible) departing toward group of soldiers (only tops of heads visible) behind hill/ some holding spears (link with Zodiac Sign: Sagittarius)//	Scene in hilly landscape with path and trees//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Block border at left margin of floreate and foliate decoration/ including daisies/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 15r
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Miracle of healing -- Beneath rays streaming through arched portal/ man/ wearing headgear and tunic/ raises right hand/ places left hand on breast/ kneels before Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ with right hand raised toward face of man/ attended by five nimbed apostles/ one with joined hands raised//	Scene in room with decorative wall and tiled floor/ Landscape with trees and clouds in sky beyond portal//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Margin/ lower:/	Month/ Occupation: December -- Beneath rays/ veiled woman/ wearing apron/ raises left hand/ before man/ wearing apron/ straddling recumbent boar/ draining blood from its slit neck into vessel on ground/ Behind him/ man/ wearing hat/ stands/ extending right forefinger//	Scene in village (?)/ with four buildings/ two sheaves of grain and stone ground//	Medallion vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including thistles//	Block border at right of floreate and foliate decoration and gold vessel/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 15v
folio_text: Margin/ upper:/	Christ: Miracle of Loaves -- Flanked by ten standing men/ wearing hats/ Christ/ decorated crossed nimbus/ holds broken loaf in both hands behind draped table laden with four loaves and platter of two fishes//	Scene in room with decorative wall and tiled floor//	Arched vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including currants//	Margin/ lower:/	Sick man/ wearing cap/ lies on pillow/ with bare arm on cover/ in canopied bed behind veiled woman/ wearing black mantle with left hand extended toward him/ and man/ extending platter of food (?) toward the sick man//	Scene in bedroom with tiled wall and floor//	Square vignette within block border of floreate and foliate decoration//	Block border at left of floreate and foliate decoration and gold vessel/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 26v
folio_text: Virgin Mary: Visitation -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ and Elizabeth/ nimbed/ veiled with wimple/ embrace before Joseph the Carpenter (?)/ flanked by two angels wearing vestments//	Scene in hilly landscape with trees with path leading to city in background//	Margin/ lower:/	Legend/ Hercules: Hercules slaying Nessus -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ Hercules/ name erroneously inscribed ARCHILES/ wearing helmet and armor/ stands on left bank/ drawing arrow in bow at Nessus the Centaur/ bearded/ holding club in left hand/ head turned back toward Dejanira/ wearing veiled hennin/ mounted sideways on his back/ departing on right bank//	Scene in landscape with river and trees//	Margins decorated with border of floreate and foliate decoration/ including grapes/ daisies/ roses and thistles/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 39r
folio_text: Shepherds: Annunciation -- Beneath rays and starry sky/ angel/ holding scroll/ descends toward two shepherds/ one wearing hat/ extending right hand/ and the other hooded/ raising right hand/ each holding pedum in left hand/ wearing purse at waist/ both looking up; flock of eight black sheep//	In foreground/ two other shepherds/ one wearing hat/ playing bagpipe/ and the other hooded/ with right hand shielding eyes/ looking up/ both flank veiled shepherdess/ seated/ holding gold wreath (?) on lap; flock of fifteen (?) white sheep//	Scene in landscape with trees/ fence at left/ water before city/ and buildings and towers on hills in distance//	Margin/ left:/	Scene: unidentified -- Bearded man/ in fruit tree/ lowers left arm/ dropping red fruit (?) to raised left hand of maiden/ beside veiled woman holding fold of apron containing fruit//	Figures in hilly landscape with trees and starry sky above//	Margin/ lower:/	Moses: Miracle of Manna -- Manna descends from cloud/ emitting rays/ above Moses/ name inscribed MOYSE/ horned/ bearded/ looking up/ holding fleuron-tipped scepter in left hand and Tables of Law in right hand//	Behind him/ man/ wearing hat/ gathers manna in fold of garment and two men/ wearing hats/ extend hands toward falling manna/ beside basket on ground; four other men/ two wearing hats/ raise hands toward manna//	Scene in landscape with trees/ within medallion//	Margins decorated with floreate and foliate decoration/ including violas/ thistles and currants and one vessel/

tomb_text: Book of hoursFrance/ probably Rouen/ ca/ 1470MS M/32 fol/ 51r
folio_text: Christ: Nativity -- Beneath starry sky and rays issuing from arc of heaven/ two angels kneel with joined hands raised/ between Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ with joined hands raised/ and Joseph the Carpenter/ extending hands/ both kneeling/ flanking Christ Child/ nimbed/ nude/ emitting rays/ reclining on Virgin’s mantle on ground/ all in front of ass/ tied to shed structure/ and ox//	All under shed with decorative wall and bed (?)/ and wattled fence//	Landscape with trees and city in background//	Margin/ right:/	1) Beneath starry sky one of three shepherds plays bagpipe/ the second/ wearing hat/ plays recorder/ and the third carries pedum-like staff in left hand//	Figures on path in landscape with hill and trees in background//	2) Centaur/ wearing headgear/ on grass amid flowers/	Margin/ lower/ reading from right to left:/	1) Augustus: Prophecy of Sibyl -- Augustus/ name inscribed OCTOUIEN/ wearing imperial crown/ with hands raised/ kneels looking up toward cloud-edged arc of heaven/ emitting rays/ enclosing bust of Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ holding Child Child/ nimbed/ nude/ Tiburtine Sibyl/ inscribed SIBILA/ wearing headdress/ stands/ looking up/ raises right forefinger toward vision//	Scene in landscape with trees and hill in background/ within medallion//	2) Archer/ wearing hat/ drawing bow in arrow/ on grass amid flowers//	3) Augustus: Edict of Taxes -- Augustus/ crowned/ wearing ermine collar/ is seated on canopied throne/ extending right hand holding edict with pseudo-inscriptions and pendant seal/ toward extended right hand of kneeling man/ holding hat in right hand/ in front of five men/ four wearing hats/ one wearing ermine collar/ and two with hands extended/ all standing//	Figures in room with decorative wall and window//	Margins decorated with floreate and foliate decoration including daisies/ currants and grapes against gold background/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ probably Mons/ between 1490 and 1500M/33 fol/ 14r
folio_text: Trinity: Two Persons flanking Dove -- Dove of Holy Ghost/ nimbed/ is flanked by Son/ wearing crown of thorns/ raising right hand in blessing/ and Father/ wearing triple crown tiara/ They hold open book between them/ Figures surrounded by clouds/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ probably Mons/ between 1490 and 1500M/33 fol/ 18r
folio_text: Gregory the Great: Scene/ celebrating Mass -- Clergy/ tonsured/ kneels/ holding candle in left hand and/ with right hand/ grasping garment of Gregory the Great/ nimbed/ tonsured/ kneeling with hands extended toward altar/ upon which is open book and half-figure of Christ/ rays as nimbus/ with hands raised/ He is in front of retable/ Below/ kneeling figure/ tonsured/ with hat slung around neck/ holds triple crown tiara in left hand/ Scene in room with portal/ two windows and curtain/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ probably Mons/ between 1490 and 1500M/33 fol/ 20v
folio_text: Christ: Crucifixion -- Christ/ rays as nimbus/ crowned with thorns/ with eyes closed and inclined head/ in loin cloth/ is affixed with three nails to cross surmouned by titulus INRI/At left is Virgin Mary/ nimbed/ veiled/ swooning and supported by Evangelist John/ nimbed/ and woman/ wearing headdress/ Behind them is second woman/ veiled/ with hands raised/At right are three men/ wearing hats/ One has scimitar hanging over shoulder and left hand raised/Landscape with buildings in background/In illusionistic border are instruments of Passion/ including scourges/ chalice/ crown of thorns/ three nails/ spear/ and sponge/ In the border are also pelican feeding three young with its own blood/ violas/ and moth/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ probably Mons/ between 1490 and 1500M/33 fol/ 21r
folio_text: Christ: bearing Cross -- In decorated initial D is Christ/ rays as nimbus/ carrying tau-cross over left shoulder/In illusionistic border are instruments of Passion/ including hand/ pincers/ scimitar/ Veronica's veil/ head of man wearing hat/ cock (rooster) upon column around which are two ropes/ head of man beside head of Christ/ pitcher on plate/ withes/ rows of coins/ lantern/ hammer/ three dice/ and drill/

tomb_text: Book of HoursFrance/ probably Mons/ between 1490 and 1500M/33 fol/ 33v
